mapper.select: SELECT BASE_CODE,BASE_CODE AS BASE_VALUE FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='PLANT' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ORDER BY BASE_SORT asc

SELECT PM_IDX,PM_PART_CODE,PART_NAME as PM_PART_NAME,PM_PART_PLANT_CODE,PM_PART_COUNTRY,PM_QUALITY,PM_STATUS,PM_CHEMICAL_YN FROM SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA spd INNER JOIN SC_PART_CODE spc ON spd.PM_PART_CODE = spc.PART_CODE WHERE PM_IDX = #{idx}
SELECT BASE_CODE,BASE_VALUE FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='APPVSTATUS' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ORDER BY BASE_SORT asc

SELECT pmd.PM_IDX , pmd.PM_PART_CODE , pc.PART_NAME , pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE , pmd.PM_QUALITY , pmd.PM_STATUS , pmd.PM_CHEMICAL_YN , pmd.PM_ACTIVE_YN , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_REG_DATE , pmd.PM_REG_USER , ui.USER_NAME as PM_REG_USER_NAME , ui.USER_ID as PM_REG_USER_ID , pmd.PM_APPROVAL_STATUS , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_APPROVAL_DATE , pmd.PM_MODIFY_USER --, ui2.USER_NAME as PM_MODIFY_USER_NAME --, ui2.USER_ID as PM_MODIFY_USER_ID , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_REQUEST_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_REQUEST_APPROVAL_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_MODIFY_DATE , pc.COM_CODE , scc.COM_NAME , scc.COM_NATION FROM SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pmd LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pmd.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE AND pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE = pc.PLANT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui ON pmd.PM_REG_USER = ui.USER_IDX --LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui2 ON pmd.PM_MODIFY_USER = ui.USER_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE scc ON scc.COM_CODE = pc.COM_CODE WHERE pc.COM_CODE = #{COM_CODE}
AND (scc.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
AND (pmd.PM_PART_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_CODE}), '%'))
AND (pc.PART_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PART_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ui.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_REG_USER}), '%'))
AND (PM_ACTIVE_YN = #{PM_ACTIVE_YN})
AND (pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_PLANT_CODE}), '%'))
AND (pmd.PM_APPROVAL_STATUS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_APPROVAL_STATUS}), '%'))
AND (pmd.PM_APPROVAL_DATE >= #{SEARCH_PM_SDATE})
AND (pmd.PM_APPROVAL_DATE <= #{SEARCH_PM_EDATE})

SELECT pmd.PM_IDX , pmd.PM_PART_CODE , pc.PART_NAME , pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE , pmd.PM_QUALITY , pmd.PM_STATUS , pmd.PM_CHEMICAL_YN , pmd.PM_ACTIVE_YN , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_REG_DATE , pmd.PM_REG_USER , ui.USER_NAME as PM_REG_USER_NAME , ui.USER_ID as PM_REG_USER_ID , pmd.PM_APPROVAL_STATUS , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_APPROVAL_DATE , pmd.PM_MODIFY_USER --, ui2.USER_NAME as PM_MODIFY_USER_NAME --, ui2.USER_ID as PM_MODIFY_USER_ID , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_REQUEST_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_REQUEST_APPROVAL_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_MODIFY_DATE , pc.COM_CODE , scc.COM_NAME , scc.COM_NATION FROM SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pmd LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pmd.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE AND pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE = pc.PLANT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui ON pmd.PM_REG_USER = ui.USER_IDX --LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui2 ON pmd.PM_MODIFY_USER = ui.USER_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE scc ON scc.COM_CODE = pc.COM_CODE WHERE pmd.PM_IDX = #{PM_IDX}

SELECT pc.PART_CODE , pc.PART_NAME , pc.PLANT_CODE , scc.COM_CODE , scc.COM_NAME , scc.COM_NATION FROM SC_PART_CODE pc LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE scc ON scc.COM_CODE = pc.COM_CODE WHERE scc.COM_CODE = #{COM_CODE} AND pc.PART_STATUS = 'Y'
AND (pc.PART_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PART_CODE}), '%'))
AND (pc.PART_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PART_NAME}), '%'))

SELECT PART_CODE,COM_NATION AS PART_COUNTRY,PART_NAME,bc.BASE_CODE FROM SC_PART_CODE pc LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT Base_code, base_value FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='PLANT' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ) bc ON pc.PLANT_CODE = bc.base_code INNER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE scc ON pc.COM_CODE = scc.COM_CODE

SELECT PART_CODE as PM_PART_CODE , PART_NAME , PM_APPROVAL_STATUS AS PM_APPROVAL_STATUS , spmd.PM_ACTIVE_YN FROM SC_PART_CODE spc INNER JOIN SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA spmd ON spc.PART_CODE = spmd.PM_PART_CODE AND spc.PLANT_CODE = spmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE scc ON spc.COM_CODE = scc.COM_CODE WHERE spmd.PM_IDX =#{idx}
SELECT SVHC_NUM, SVHC_NAME,SVHC_CASNUM,SVHC_EUNUM FROM SC_SVHC_DATA ORDER BY SVHC_IDX asc

SELECT SVHC_IDX,PM_IDX,DATA_GUBUN,NVL(CONFIRM_DATE, ' ') AS CONFIRM_DATE,NVL(APPLICABLE_NO,' ') AS APPLICABLE_NO ,NVL(FILE_PATH,' ') AS FILE_PATH,NVL(FILE_NAME,' ') AS FILE_NAME,NVL(WARRANTY_ITEM,' ') AS WARRANTY_ITEM FROM SC_PART_MGMT_SVHC_DATA WHERE PM_IDX=#{idx}

SELECT NVL(DECL_NUM,' ') AS DECL_NUM ,NVL(DECL_SUB_NUM,' ') as DECL_SUB_NUM,DECL_NAME, DECL_CASNUM,NVL(DECL_WEIGHT,' ') AS DECL_WEIGHT ,NVL(DECL_CLASS, ' ') AS DECL_CLASS FROM SC_DECLARATION_DATA ORDER BY DECL_IDX asc

SELECT DECL_IDX,PM_IDX,DATA_GUBUN,NVL(CONFIRM_DATE, ' ') AS CONFIRM_DATE,NVL(APPLICABLE_NO,' ') AS APPLICABLE_NO,NVL(NONE_APPLICABLE_NO,' ') AS NONE_APPLICABLE_NO ,NVL(FILE_PATH,' ') AS FILE_PATH,NVL(FILE_NAME,' ') AS FILE_NAME,NVL(WARRANTY_ITEM,' ') AS WARRANTY_ITEM FROM SC_PART_MGMT_DECLARATION_DATA WHERE PM_IDX=#{idx}
